subject: Happy New Year!
preview: Wishing you a fantastic year ahead...
body: Welcome to the New Year! We hope this year brings you joy, success, and everything you wish for. Move this mail up to archive it!

subject: Resolution Time
preview: Have you made your list yet?
body: It is time to set some goals. Remember, small steps lead to big changes. What will you achieve this year?
